text: "The Deceiver" is a limited edition guitar made by the American guitar manufacturer B.C. Rich. Based on their 'assassin' guitar, The Deceiver was only made during March 2003 as part of the Body Art Collection. The image on the front of the guitar is of several snakes copyrighted to Skate the Planet. ==Specifications== Body: Basswood (single ply) Neck: Maple Fingerboard: Rosewood Neck Joint: Bolt-on Bridge: Tune-o-matic (strings anchor through body) Pick-ups: Double blade "Dual Rail", and double humbucker (both BCRich) Category:B.C. Rich electric guitars
title: B.C. Rich The Deceiver
